page.title: 12MAJOR INDUSTRY IN AREA.
page.content: The T.A.C. (TURNER AND NEWALL ASBESTOS COMPANY), employs 452 people.The building has been open for 750 years.The nature of the business is manufacturing for the construction business.Raw materials are obtained from cement companies and their asbestos from Canada,Zimbabwe and South Africa. The finished product goes to stock yards, distribution buildings and local depots. This is the largest factory site owned by T.A.C. The smallest company building is a new one in Blackburn.They chose this area because there was plenty of labour and cheap building land. Mostly local people are employed. The main aim for the future is to survive as a manufacturing unit. The man interviewed, MR.Lilley, has worked here for 6 years.
